header_text: While walking across the backyard during a family barbecue, you stumble and trip unexpectedly in front of your family. Your once-confident stride is now replaced by an unsteady gait. After tripping, you feel overwhelmed.

elements.text: A family member comes over to check in to see if you're okay. You express how you're feeling about your unsteadiness and start to feel...
